meanings.definition: Failure to fulfill or carry out a promise or obligation.
meanings.sent1: The nonfulfillment of his promise left her disappointed.
meanings.sent2: The nonfulfillment of the contract led to legal issues.
meanings.sent3: The nonfulfillment of the birthday surprise made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The nonfulfillment of his words hung over him like a dark cloud.
meanings.sent5: The nonfulfillment of the order was a costly mistake for the company.

meanings.definition: The state of not being fulfilled or completed.
meanings.sent1: She felt a sense of nonfulfillment after the project was abandoned.
meanings.sent2: The nonfulfillment of his dreams weighed heavily on him.
meanings.sent3: The nonfulfillment of the puzzle left them puzzled.
meanings.sent4: The nonfulfillment of the plan left them stranded.
meanings.sent5: The nonfulfillment of the goal was a setback for the team.
